So I picked up the latest issue of urlLink Dungeon , and I'm already sceptical because they're doing the whole "reformatting" thing, yet again. So I'm flipping through it and I notice one of the new columns, on the last page, written by Wil Wheaton. Apparently urlLink Wil is a gamer... I did not know this. It seems very strange to me - but *shrug* guess we'll take what we can get. On the plus side the new Dungeon format seems solid enough, and all the new columns were quite good.
